verses.name: 1 Kings 17:5
verses.text: So he went and did according unto the word of the Lord: for he went and dwelt by the brook Cherith, that is before Jordan.

verses.name: 1 Kings 17:6
verses.text: And the ravens brought him bread and flesh in the morning, and bread and flesh in the evening; and he drank of the brook.

verses.name: 1 Kings 17:7
verses.text: And it came to pass after a while, that the brook dried up, because there had been no rain in the land.

verses.name: 1 Kings 17:8
verses.text: And the word of the Lord came unto him, saying,
